item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I am a postdoctoral researcher with Tal Yarkoni in the Psychoinformatics Lab, Department of Psychology @ UT Austin. As part of PI Lab, I am currently contributing to developing Neuroscout and deploying it to investigate human cognitive processes in naturalistic contexts, with a special focus on natural language. I am especially interested in using NLP architectures to model text and investigate how the human mind constructs meaning representations out of complex linguistic input.
